title: Sanukhabar news portal (multi-category news site)

requirements.text: Create a public-facing Sanukhabar news portal frontend with a responsive layout that lets users browse all types of news.

quotes: Build a website of the name of the company is sanukhabar.  This website is news portal where every types of news found

acceptanceCriteria: Site header displays the brand name “Sanukhabar”.
Home page shows a list of latest news articles with headline, category, publish date, and short excerpt.
Layout is responsive and usable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Implement news categories and category-based navigation so users can easily find different types of news.

quotes: This website is news portal where every types of news found

acceptanceCriteria: Backend supports creating and listing categories (e.g., Politics, Sports, Business, Technology, Entertainment, World).
Frontend shows category navigation (header and/or sidebar) and a dedicated category page that lists articles for that category.
Selecting a category filters articles to that category only.

requirements.text: Implement article detail pages that display the full content of a selected news article.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking an article from any list opens an article detail page/route.
Detail page shows title, category, publish date, author (if present), cover image (if present), and body content.
If an article is not found, show a clear “Article not found” state.

requirements.text: Add backend storage and APIs for news articles, including creating, updating, deleting, listing (latest), listing by category, and fetching by ID.
acceptanceCriteria: Articles are persisted in canister state and survive canister upgrades (stable storage).
APIs exist for: listLatest (paginated), listByCategory (paginated), getById, create, update, delete.
Article record includes at least: id, title, categoryId, excerpt, content, createdAt/updatedAt timestamps, and optional coverImageUrl.

requirements.text: Add an authenticated admin interface for publishing news articles and managing categories using Internet Identity.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin routes are not accessible unless the user is authenticated.
Backend enforces authorization for create/update/delete operations (public users can only read).
Admin UI supports: create/edit/delete article; create/edit/delete category.

requirements.text: Add basic search and sorting on the frontend to help users find relevant news quickly.
acceptanceCriteria: Home (or a dedicated search view) includes a search input that filters articles by title (client-side or via backend query).
Users can sort or toggle between at least “Latest” and “Oldest” on article lists.
Empty states are handled (e.g., “No articles found”).

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, newspaper-inspired visual theme across the site (avoid blue/purple): off-white backgrounds, charcoal text, muted red accent, clear typography hierarchy (serif for headlines, sans-serif for UI), and consistent spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistently applied across header, lists, detail pages, and admin pages.
Primary accent color is not blue or purple.
Typography clearly differentiates headlines, subheadings, metadata, and body text.

requirements.text: Generate and include static brand assets for Sanukhabar and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Header uses the generated logo asset.
Home page uses the generated hero/banner asset.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing UI text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or the immutable hook paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose them instead).
Do not add third-party authentication; only Internet Identity is allowed.
nonGoals: Integrations with external news APIs or web scraping.
Real-time breaking news via websockets/push notifications.
Paid subscriptions, paywalls, or payment processing.

required: Sanukhabar wordmark logo, clean editorial style, transparent background (sanukhabar-logo.dim_512x160.png)
Wide homepage hero banner with subtle newspaper texture and abstract world/news motifs, no text (sanukhabar-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

Set of 6 simple editorial category icons (Politics, Sports, Business, Technology, Entertainment, World) in a consistent outline style, transparent backgrounds (sanukhabar-category-icons.dim_256x256.png)
